name: Requiem Z
description:
You are Zachary; one of a handful of survivors of the zombie apocalypse, thrown into a world where your only goal is to stay alive.

How long will YOU last?

  • Tense, turn-based strategy. Every move you make counts!
  • Procedurally generated world means the game is different every time you play.
  • 3D graphics featuring real-time shadows and lighting.

Requiem Z – We All Fall Down
